name: Space Mirror (sorskoot)
description:
Space Mirror

Your base is under attack!! You don't have any guns to fight back. You only have two mirrors to reflect the lasers shot at you back to the space ships. And destroy them to save your base.

Note:

This game can only be played in VR. So plug in your HTC Vice, Oculus Rift or browse to this page using your Oculus Quest.
